room_title: Escape room "The Pyramid" by Room X Escape in Chicago
review: Had a great time in the mummy room yesterday. The owner is super nice and the game was challenging but fun. Probably wouldn’t have made it out without the 6 other guys that were with us, but that’s okay! We’ll definitely be going back to try the treasure and castle rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Pyramid" by Room X Escape in Chicago
review: It was an awesome experience for our group. Very clean and cleverly organized. I would highly recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "The Pyramid" by Room X Escape in Chicago
review: Our group did the Egypt room, and it was quite the adrenaline rush! It was a multi-room adventure that forces you to really work as a team to gather all the clues and see how they connect. Plus, there were more than a few really cool surprises throughout. Very memorable!
